meanings: to the best of one's ability

lessons.japanese: その会社は常に顧客を満足させるように努めている。
lessons.english: The company always strives to satisfy its customers.

lessons.japanese: 現在、通常のサービスの早急な復旧に努めています。
lessons.english: We are currently working to restore normal service as soon as possible.

lessons.japanese: 彼は民衆の支持を得ようと努めていた。
lessons.english: He was bidding for popular support.

lessons.japanese: 彼は努めて雇い主を満足させようとした。
lessons.english: He was zealous in satisfying his employer.

lessons.japanese: 政府は公害を除去しようと努めている。
lessons.english: The government is trying to get rid of pollution.

lessons.japanese: 水面から飛び立つ鳥は努めてあとを濁さぬようにする。
lessons.english: A bird flying out of the water is careful not to cause turbulence.

lessons.japanese: 情報をずっと得たいので私はできるだけ読書に努めている。
lessons.english: In order to keep informed, I try to read as much as possible.

lessons.japanese: その会社は常に顧客を満足させるように努めている。
lessons.english: The company always strives to satisfy its customers.

lessons.japanese: 人質にとられながら、彼は努めて勇敢に振る舞った。
lessons.english: He tried to brave it out while held as a hostage.

lessons.japanese: 人質にとられながら、彼は努めて勇敢に振る舞った。
lessons.english: He tried to be brave while he was being held hostage.
